page.title: 05STRAWBERRY FAYRE
page.content: THE STRAWBERRY FAYRE IS A SORT OF FESTIVAL IN {JUNE}TO CELEBRATE THE GROWING OF STRAWBERRIES AND TO RAISE MONEY FOR THE FOOTBALL CLUB AND THE VILLAGE MEMORIAL HALL. THERE ARE COMPETITIONS TO FIND THE BEST { {STRAWBERRIES}. THE WINNERS GETTING CUPS. ONE YEAR THEY GAVE SOME OF THE MONEY TO HELP HANDICAPPED FALKLAND SAILORS TO HAVE A HOLIDAY IN { {DRAYCOTT.}IN 1985 THERE WAS A COLLECTION FOR THE BRADFORD FOOTBAL CLUB DISASTER FUND. SO PEOPLE ENJOYING THEMSELVES IN DRAYCOTT HELP OTHERS LESS FORTUNATE. EACH YEAR THERE IS A { {STRAWBERRY QUEEN.}THE MAIN ATTRACTION IS A HELICOPTER AND IN 1985 PARACHUTISTS LANDED IN THE CENTRE OF THE FIELD, AFTER A BABY ELEPHANT HAD OPENED THE {FAYRE}.
